Body:
f = op.models.physics.capillary_pressure.sinusoidal_bidirectional
self.geo['pore.touch'] = (np.random.random(self.geo.Np) + 0.5) * 0.1
self.geo['throat.length'] = 1.0
self.phys.add_model(propname='throat.bidirectional', model=f, r_toroid=0.25,
    surface_tension='pore.surface_tension', contact_angle=
    'pore.contact_angle', pore_diameter='pore.touch')
diff = self.phys['throat.bidirectional'][:, (0)] - self.phys[
    'throat.bidirectional'][:, (1)]
assert np.any(diff != 0)
